response.answer_text: no. business means commercial activity, usually for profit: producing (goods and services), buying, and selling; exchanging; and lending and borrowing. busy-ness (colloquially, i.e. informally) means the state of being busy (active).

Umm I am doing business and it's like if you have a lot of work,you have many customers than you are very busy. Otherwise you can take out time for some important things. Business doesn't always keeps you busy.
